data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Right now, it is ten thirty in the morning. I ____ to ____ my ____ by ____ thirty. My ____ are ____ to ____, ____ I ____ to ____ with ____. But I need to do a lot of reading before then.
data.partBlankContent: Right now, it is ten thirty in the morning. I wa__ to fin___ my home____ by twe___ thirty. My fri____ are go___ to lu___, a__ I wa__ to g_ with th__. But I need to do a lot of reading before then.
data.fullContent: Right now, it is ten thirty in the morning. I want to finish my homework by twelve thirty. My friends are going to lunch, and I want to go with them. But I need to do a lot of reading before then.
data.answer: 现在是早上10点半。我想在十二点半之前完成作业。我的朋友们要去吃午饭，我想和他们一起去。但在那之前我需要大量阅读。
